title: Sovereign AGI Governance State Manifest
description: Defines the holistic operational state and versioning of the Sovereign AGI governance system components, designed for high-efficiency reporting and autonomous policy enforcement tracking.

manifestId.description: Unique identifier for this specific governance state snapshot.

schemaVersion.description: Internal version of this schema structure itself (e.g., v1.0).

systemVersion.description: The specific Sovereign AGI runtime version this state was captured against (e.g., v94.2).

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when this state manifest was generated.

components.description: State mapping of all actively governed components, indexed by canonical component identifier.

health.description: Operational health of the specific component.

policyCompliance.description: A score (0-100) indicating adherence to governing policies and standards. Higher is better.

lastCheckTimestamp.description: Timestamp of the last successful governance check or heartbeat.

issueCount.description: Total number of unresolved, critical issues currently flagged for this component.
